lexa.core.data

Interface DataItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DataItem>, DataFactoryItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayDataItem, BaseDataItem, ConfigDataItem, HashDataItem

    public interface DataItem
extends java.lang.Comparable<DataItem>, DataFactoryItem
    Interface for a single DataItem
    Since:
    2015-03
    Author:
    william
